code:
gantt
    title Planificación Round Robin (CloudNative_ServiceMesh) - Parte 1 (CloudNative_DockerImage)
    dateFormat X
    axisFormat %s

    section CPU
    P1(CloudNative_HelmChart)      :active, cpu1, 0, 3
    P2(CloudNative_K8sCluster)      :active, cpu2, 3, 6
    P3(CloudNative_HelmChart)      :active, cpu3, 6, 9
    P4(CloudNative_K8sCluster)     :active, cpu4, 9, 11
    P1(CloudNative_K8sCluster)    :active, cpu5, 11, 13
    P3(CloudNative_Serverless)    :active, cpu6, 13, 14
    P2(CloudNative_HelmChart)    :active, cpu7, 14, 15

    section I/O
    P1_IO(CloudNative_DockerImage) :crit, io1, 13, 15
    P2_IO(CloudNative_DockerImage) :crit, io2, 15, 16
    P4_IO(CloudNative_K8sCluster) :crit, io3, 11, 14
repo_description: Introducción a los sistemas operativos, partiendo de sistemas Unix. Exportación a PDF y ePUB.
